post.description: Refresh hub data from remote source

get.description: Download file using token (no auth required)

Permission.description: AWS-style permissions for fine-grained access control

PaginationQuery.description: Standard pagination query parameters for basic list endpoints

ProxySettings.description: Common proxy settings structure used for both system-wide and provider-specific proxy configuration

tools.description: Tools capability - can use function calling/tools

repeat_last_n.description: Number of last tokens to consider for repetition penalty

MistralRsSettings.description: MistralRs-specific settings for individual model performance and batching configuration

model_id_name.description: Model ID name for --model-id in subcommands

device_ids.description: Array of device IDs for multi-GPU

max_seqs.description: Maximum running sequences at any time (--max-seqs)

truncate_sequence.description: Truncate sequences that exceed max length (--truncate-sequence)

paged_attn_gpu_mem.description: GPU memory for KV cache in MBs (--pa-gpu-mem)

paged_ctxt_len.description: Total context length for KV cache (--pa-ctxt-len)

prefix_cache_n.description: Number of prefix caches to hold (--prefix-cache-n)

dtype.description: Model data type: auto, f16, f32, bf16 (--dtype)

max_edge.description: Maximum edge length for image resizing (--max-edge)

serve_ip.description: Server IP address to serve on

device_ids.description: Array of device IDs for multi-GPU

keep.description: Tokens to keep from initial prompt (--keep, default: 0)

mlock.description: Force model to stay in RAM (--mlock, default: false)

threads_batch.description: Batch processing threads (--threads-batch, default: same as threads)

no_kv_offload.description: Disable KV cache offloading (--no-kv-offload, default: false)

n_gpu_layers.description: Number of layers on GPU (--n-gpu-layers, default: 0)

split_mode.description: How to split across GPUs: none/layer/row (--split-mode)

cache_type_k.description: KV cache data type for K (--cache-type-k)

cache_type_v.description: KV cache data type for V (--cache-type-v)

id.description: Model ID from hub (for hub downloads) or null for manual downloads

DownloadRequestData.description: Request data for initiating a download

model_name.description: Model name or ID from the repository

files.description: Specific files to download (if None, download all)

source.description: Source information for tracking download origin

speed_bps.description: Download speed in bytes per second

ConversationPaginationQuery.description: Extended pagination query for conversation-related endpoints
